name: Buckler
description: A light shield that can easily be used alongside a weapon.

name: Heater Shield
description: A lighter and more maneuverable shield.

name: Kite Shield
description: A tall, rhomboid shield that is favored in mounted combat.

name: Tower Shield
description: An enormous shield that protects a great deal of space.

name: Snarlshield
description: A snarlshield has a collection of short, blunt spikes on its surface designed to catch weapons and rip them from the attacker's grasp.

name: Wall Shield
description: A square shield designed to be used in formation with others of its kind.

name: Warshield
description: A specialized shield designed to be dual wielded.
